name: Dr. Elias Towe
bio: Specializes in quantum algorithms and cryptography, guiding our research endeavors and fostering academic excellence.

name: Dr. Sridhar Tayur
bio: Passionate about quantum machine learning and fostering a vibrant community within the club. Drives strategic initiatives.

name: Arul Rhik Mazumder
bio: Leads our initiatives in quantum error correction and experimental quantum systems, pushing theoretical boundaries.

name: Dana Decoherence
bio: Organizes engaging workshops, speaker series, and social gatherings, ensuring a dynamic club experience.

name: Eve Superposition
bio: Manages club communications, maintains records, and assists with administrative tasks for smooth operations.

name: Frank Fermion
bio: Handles the club's finances and budget, ensuring responsible allocation of resources for all activities.
